title: Rails Girls Galway
description: Rails Girls comes to Galway again! During the *free* two-days workshop in June 2015, we will dive into the magical world of Ruby on Rails and build an application together, from scratch.

title: Coding Grace Learn Fungus & Unity 3D
description: This introductory course will provide participants with the knowledge and practice they need to create a fun 2D interactive storytelling game in Unity 3D.

title: Women Who Code, Belfast - Creating REST APIs for Mobile App Development
description: This event will involve a tech talk by Dr Steve Walsh, the CTO of Belfast based startup Secure Broadcast, on the details of creating a REST API for mobile app development (the demo will be on iOS). Come along and find out why REST APIs and mobile app development are so important to shaping the future of the mobile app industry.

title: Coding Grace - Intermediate AngularJS Workshop @ WomenTechmakers
description: Women Techmakers have invited Coding Grace to run an Intermediate AngularJS workshop after a successful Beginners one recently. We are delighted to be back and will be headed by Serena and Sarah. Women Techmakers will start the day by a show and tell, followed by workshops/code labs covering many technologies and for different level.

title: Coding Grace - Creating Storytelling Games with Fungus & Unity 3D @ Women Techmakers
description: Women Techmakers will start the day by a show and tell, followed by workshops/code labs covering many technologies and for different level. This introductory course will provide participants with the knowledge and practice they need to create a fun 2D interactive storytelling game in Unity 3D.

title: Coding Grace - Data Analysis with Python
description: Coding Grace are delighted to have Kevin O'Brien back again to run another beginners Data Analysis with Python workshop.

title: PyLadies Dublin
description: Our focus is to help more women become active participants and leaders in the Python open-source community. Our mission is to promote, educate and advance a diverse Python community.

title: Geek Girl Dinners
description: Girl Geek Dinners are a chance for ladies in technology to get together, enjoy some nice food and drinks, and have fun meeting other women in their field.

title: PyLadies Dublin
description: Our focus is to help more women become active participants and leaders in the Python open-source community. Our mission is to promote, educate and advance a diverse Python community.

title: Coding Grace - Introduction to Animation
description: This beginners workshop will be mentored by Daniel Spencer (Giant Animation). It will be a mix of practical and theory stuff as well as studying animation and sparking up conversation about technique as well.

title: Codess Dublin
description: An exciting evening exploring Digital Life Digital Work including Mary Carty from Outbox Incubator and an interactive Dual Coaching session.

title: Coding Grace - Introduction to R
description: Beginners Workshop in R, hosted by Insight Centre for Data Analytics, DCU

title: Coder Girl Hack Day
description: CoderDojoGirls, GirlsHackIreland, Coding Grace, TOG Dublin have combined forced for an artsy themed coding hackathon to celebrate International Day Of the Girl.

title: Women who Code, Belfast
description: September Meetup - CV writing tips, interview skills & importance of LinkedIn

description: November Meetup - Front-End Web Development for Beginners

description: This workshop will show you how to use HTML and CSS to make webpages

title: WITS25, Celebrating 25 Years of Women in Technology and Science
description: Alicia Clements will talk about her life in STEM and how her career has developed from engineering to project management.

title: Rails Girls Dublin
description: For the third time Rails Girls is coming to Dublin! Join experts in Rails from the industry at Zendesk to learn how to make your very own web app.

description: Girl Geek Dinners are a chance for ladies in technology to get together, enjoy some nice food and drinks, and have fun meeting other women in their field.

title: WITS Ireland AGM
description: All members are invited to attend the AGM in the Science Gallery, Pearse Street, Dublin 2. The AGM will be followed by a light lunch and networking.
